Classes in com.jswiff.swfrecords used by com.jswiff
Rect
          This class is used for the representation of a rectangle.
RGB
          Represents a 24-bit RGB color.
 

Classes in com.jswiff.swfrecords used by com.jswiff.hl.factories
RGB
          Represents a 24-bit RGB color.
 

Classes in com.jswiff.swfrecords used by com.jswiff.listeners
SWFHeader
          Instances of this class represent a header of an SWF file.
 

Classes in com.jswiff.swfrecords used by com.jswiff.swfrecords
BitmapPixelData
          Base class for container classes used for the representation of bitmap pixel data.
ClipEventFlags
          This class implements a container for event flags.
Color
          Base class for colors.
CXformWithAlpha
          This record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space and the alpha channel of an object.
EdgeRecord
          Base class for edge shape records which define primitives like lines and curves.
EnhancedStrokeStyle
          Base class for the new enhanced stroke line styles introduced in SWF 8.
FillStyle
          This class is used to define a fill style.
FillStyleArray
           Implements an array of fill styles.
Filter
          TODO: Comments
GlyphEntry
          This class describes a single text character by referencing a glyph from the text font's glyph table.
Gradient
          Gradients are used for interpolation between at least two colors defined by control points.
GradRecord
          This class implements a gradient control point.
LineStyleArray
           Implements an array of line styles.
Matrix
          This class is used to represent a standard 2D transform matrix (used for affine transforms).
MorphFillStyle
          This class is used to define fill styles used in a morph sequence (as array within a DefineMorphShape tag.
MorphGradient
           This class is used for defining gradients used in morph sequences (within MorphFillStyle instances).
MorphGradRecord
          This class is used for defining a pair of control points for morph gradients (see MorphGradient for details).
Rect
          This class is used for the representation of a rectangle.
RGB
          Represents a 24-bit RGB color.
RGBA
          This class represents a color as a 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
Shape
          This class is used for defining shapes, e.g. by the DefineFont tag in order to define the character glyphs of a font, or within a DefineMorphShape tag.
ShapeRecord
          Base class for shape records which define style changes or primitives like lines and curves.
SoundEnvelope
          This class is used for time-based volume control within SoundInfo.
ZlibBitmapData
          Base class for lossless bitmap data.
 

Classes in com.jswiff.swfrecords used by com.jswiff.swfrecords.actions
RegisterParam
          This class is used by DefineFunction2 to specify the function's parameters.
 

Classes in com.jswiff.swfrecords used by com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags
AlignmentZone
          TODO: Comments
ButtonCondAction
           This record is used to define the button's event handlers.
ButtonRecord
           A button record defines a character to be displayed in one or more button states.
ClipActions
          This class is used for defining event handlers for sprites.
CXform
          This record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space of an object.
CXformWithAlpha
          This record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space and the alpha channel of an object.
KerningRecord
          A kerning record is used to adjust the distance between two glyphs.
LangCode
          This class identifies a spoken language that applies to text.
Matrix
          This class is used to represent a standard 2D transform matrix (used for affine transforms).
MorphFillStyles
           Implements an array of fill styles used in a morphing sequence.
MorphLineStyles
           Implements an array of line styles used in a morph sequence.
Rect
          This class is used for the representation of a rectangle.
RGB
          Represents a 24-bit RGB color.
RGBA
          This class represents a color as a 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
Shape
          This class is used for defining shapes, e.g. by the DefineFont tag in order to define the character glyphs of a font, or within a DefineMorphShape tag.
ShapeWithStyle
          This class extends the Shape class by including fill and line styles.
SoundInfo
          This class provides information used for playing an event sound defined with the DefineSound tag.
TextRecord
          A TextRecord contains a group of characters which share the same style and are on the same text line.
ZlibBitmapData
          Base class for lossless bitmap data.

          This class represents a color as a 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
